step1.title: üìù Take skin quiz
step1.description:
Our skincare quiz takes just 2 minutes and helps us understand your unique skin type and your specific needs.

By answering a few simple questions about your skin, lifestyle and preferences, we can create a tailored skincare routine just for you.

The quiz analyzes factors such as skin type, any skin concerns, age and environmental factors to give you the most relevant product recommendations.

step2.title: üéØ Get a recommendation
step2.description:
Based on your quiz answers, you'll receive a personalized skincare plan with product recommendations specifically selected for your skin type and needs.

Our algorithm combines traditional skincare knowledge with modern science to create a complete routine that includes cleansing, treatment, and protection.

You'll also get tips on how to best use the products for optimal results.

step3.title: üìà Follow up
step3.description:
We follow your skincare journey every week to ensure you see continuous improvements.

Through regular check-ins we can adjust your routine as needed and give you personalized tips based on how your skin develops.

You will receive reminders about when it's time to apply the products and can document your progress with photos to clearly see the improvements over time.

step4.title: ‚ú® Perfect skin!
step4.description:
Within 3 months you will see a noticeable improvement in your skin's quality and appearance.

With our natural products containing CBD and CBG, combined with your personal skincare routine, your skin will become more balanced, clearer and more radiant.

Many of our customers report visible results after just a few weeks, but the full effect is usually achieved within 3 months of consistent use.

about.title: OUR PHILOSOPHY
about.subtitle: A timeless tradition of natural skincare, founded on science and a love of nature.
about.heading: Since 1753 we have understood the skin's natural needs.
about.p1: In the heart of Swedish nature, our vision was born to create skincare that works in harmony with your skin's natural processes. We combine traditional knowledge with modern research.
about.p2: Our products contain carefully selected ingredients such as CBD and CBG, known for their soothing and balancing properties. Each formula is developed to give your skin what it needs - nothing more, nothing less.

loving.title: Loving
loving.desc: Made with care for your skin.

about.foundersQuote: Our journey began with a simple belief ‚Äî that nature holds all the answers for healthy, radiant skin. After years of research and development, we have created products that we ourselves love to use every day.
